item.title: Using a NFS Provisioner with Talos
item.description: I’ve been experimenting with running Talos in my home lab. I really like the idea of an immutable OS layer under Kubernetes and wanted to stand up a cluster to run some of my services that are currently run in docker-compose. I decided to use my Synology to store k8s volumes, here’s how I set that up

item.title: Weird shit is afoot with macOS and iTerm
